title: Invest in ExzoCoin 2.0
body:
**Proposal for:** ExzoCoin 2.0

ExzoCoin 2.0 (EXZO) is a utility token developed by the EXZO Team that is based out of Tampa, Florida, USA.

ExzoCoin 2.0 (EXZO) will be utilized on our decentralized exchange mobile application, launchpad, and blockchain for the creation of non-fungible tokens that are linked to structured private data assets. Our main focus is on providing safety, scalability, and security within the cryptocurrency and blockchain community through implementing new security protocols & genetic algorithms into smart contracts for creating a multi-layered network.

### Technical details

- **Token Name:** ExzoCoin 2.0 | EXZO
- **Token Address:** 0xF8fC63200e181439823251020d691312FDcF5090
- **Token Type:** Utility
- **Token Chain** Binance Smart Chain
- **Stage:** Launched
- **Link to the whitepaper:** https://exzocoin.com/whitepaper
- **Team doxxed:** Yes
- **Proof of dox:** https://exzocoin.com/about-us/
- **Smart contract public:** Yes
- **Audit:** Yes
- **Proof of Audit:** [Certik](https://leaderboard.certik.io/projects/exzocoin)
- **LP Lock:** Yes
- **LP Lock proof:** https://app.unicrypt.network/amm/pancake-v2/token/0xF8fC63200e181439823251020d691312FDcF5090

### Functional details

Exzo Network will be the platform that provides a wide range of blockchain and DeFi opportunities for users from swapping tokens between different blockchains and earn profits from staking to creating fully-functional dApps written in Solidity and fully compatible with Ethereum Virtual Machine (EVM).

Initially Exzo Network ecosystem will be a fork of Fantom Network (https://fantom.foundation/). This will give faster time to market, robust technology and feature-rich solutions.

**Main components of the platform will include:**

- Multi-chain Wallet & Decentralized Exchange (DEX) | Currently alpha testing iOS and Android app: https://twitter.com/EXZOcoin/status/1459783378903961600
- Main blockchain network supporting Solidity dApps
- Cross-chain swap application
- Blockchain explorer
- Governance token
- Staking module

In later versions, it is planned to introduce enterprise solutions for managing, tracking, and securing private data such as healthcare data/patient data, data for private sector industries, government, etc.

## Fund allocation and personal opinion

Long term investment in a decent project with huge potential. I'm asking for a 7.5K - 15K investment in this project with a current MCap of 8.8M. I've been investing in this project myself since it launched. The token launched in June and got dumped after the Unicrypt presale. True believers in the use-case kept supporting the dev team, who are very honest and transparant. The token gained more traction in the beginning of October because of the app progress and only went up since then. The multi-chain wallet and DEX app is currently in alpha testing phase. Check the Twitter link above.
author: 0x35B94F0e9aa2a93E1617eF54a586e1EdFe193a32
